title: Functional Grammar: Passive, Reported Speech, Discourse Markers
welcome: Welcome to Module 3: Let’s practice advanced grammar skills!
instruction: Transform the sentences using proper grammar structure.

fields.prompt: Change this sentence into passive voice: 'The teacher explains the lesson.'
fields.hint: The lesson is explained by the teacher.

fields.prompt: Change this to reported speech: 'She said, I love reading books.'
fields.hint: She said that she loved reading books.
I wanted to go outside; however, it was raining.

validation_logic.feedback_pass: Excellent! You've mastered key grammar structures.
validation_logic.feedback_fail: Let’s try again to improve your grammar accuracy.
